## type JsonReference

```go
type JsonReference struct {
    HasFullUrl      bool
    HasUrlPathOnly  bool
    HasFragmentOnly bool
    HasFileScheme   bool
    HasFullFilePath bool
    // contains filtered or unexported fields
}
```
